verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G322>appointed<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1440>seventy<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> two and <S%G303>two<s%> <S%G1417><s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G3757>whither<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G3195>would<s%> <S%G2064>come.<s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2326>harvest<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> is <S%G4183>great,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> are few: <S%G3641><s%> <S%G1189>pray<s%> ye <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2326>harvest,<s%> <S%G3704>that<s%> he would send <S%G1544>forth<s%> <S%G2040>laborers<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
Go your ways: <S%G5217><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> send you forth <S%G649><s%> <S%G5209><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> <S%G704>lambs<s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

Carry <S%G941><s%> <S%G3361>neither<s%> <S%G905>purse,<s%> <S%G3361>nor<s%> <S%G4082>scrip,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> shoes: <S%G5266><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> way. <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> ye <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to <S%G5129>this<s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G1879>rest<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> it: <S%G846><s%> if <S%G1490>not,<s%> it shall turn to you again. <S%G344><s%> <S%G1909><s%> <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G3306>remain,<s%> <S%G2068>eating<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drinking<s%> such things as they give: <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3844><s%> <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2040>laborer<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3408>hire.<s%> <S%G3327>Go<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> house. <S%G3614><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1161><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> ye <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> such things as are set <S%G3908>before<s%> you: <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G772>sick<s%> that are therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3588>The<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1161><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> ye <S%G1525>enter,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> go your ways <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4113>streets<s%> of the <S%G846>same,<s%> and say, <S%G2036><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> very <S%G2868>dust<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> which <S%G2853>cleaveth<s%> on <S%G2254>us,<s%> we do wipe <S%G631>off<s%> against you: <S%G5213><s%> <S%G4133>notwithstanding<s%> be ye <S%G1097>sure<s%> of <S%G5124>this,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is come <S%G1448>nigh<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> for <S%G4670>Sodom,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G1565>that<s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G5523>Chorazin!<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G966>Bethsaida!<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> had been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> which have been <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> they <S%G302>had<s%> a great while <S%G3819>ago<s%> <S%G3340>repented,<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4526>sackcloth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ashes. <S%G4700><s%>

But <S%G4133><s%> it shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for you. <S%G5213><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4771>thou,<s%> <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> which art <S%G5312>exalted<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> shalt be thrust <S%G2601>down<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> hell. <S%G86><s%>

He that <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G1700>me;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he that <S%G114>despiseth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G114>despiseth<s%> <S%G1691>me;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> he that <S%G114>despiseth<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G114>despiseth<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that <S%G649>sent<s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1440>seventy<s%> returned <S%G5290>again<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%> are subject <S%G5293>unto<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> I <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G796>lightning<s%> <S%G4098>fall<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G3961>tread<s%> <S%G1883>on<s%> <S%G3789>serpents<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4651>scorpions,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> enemy: <S%G2190><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> shall by any <S%G3364>means<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%G4133><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3361>not,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> are <S%G5293>subject<s%> unto <S%G5213>you;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846>that<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G21>rejoiced<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G1843>thank<s%> <S%G4671>thee,<s%> O <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> thou hast <S%G613>hid<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4908>prudent,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hast <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto babes: <S%G3516><s%> even <S%G3483>so,<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> it <S%G1096>seemed<s%> <S%G2107>good<s%> in thy sight. <S%G1715><s%> <S%G4675><s%>

All <S%G3956>things<s%> are <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he to whom <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> <S%G601>reveal<s%> him.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4762>turned<s%> him <S%G4314>unto<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2596>privately,<s%> <S%G2398><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> which <S%G991>see<s%> the things <S%G3739>that<s%> ye see: <S%G991><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> have <S%G2309>desired<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G991>see,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen<s%> them; <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G191>hear<s%> those things <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G191>hear,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> them.

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G3544>lawyer<s%> stood <S%G450>up,<s%> and <S%G1598>tempted<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do<s%> to <S%G2816>inherit<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life?<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>He<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law?<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G314>readest<s%> thou?

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> Thou shalt <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G2479>strength,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1271>mind;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4572>thyself.<s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Thou hast <S%G611>answered<s%> right: <S%G3723><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> thou shalt live. <S%G2198><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he,<s%> <S%G2309>willing<s%> to <S%G1344>justify<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor?<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5274>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2410>Jericho,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> fell <S%G4045>among<s%> <S%G3027>thieves,<s%> which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G2532><s%> stripped <S%G1562><s%> <S%G846>him<s%> of his raiment, <S%G2532>and<s%> wounded <S%G2007><s%> <S%G4127><s%> him, and <S%G565>departed,<s%> <S%G863>leaving<s%> <S%G5177>him<s%> half dead. <S%G2253><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G4795>chance<s%> there came <S%G2597>down<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> way: <S%G3598><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he passed by on the other side. <S%G492><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>a<s%> <S%G3019>Levite,<s%> when he <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>looked<s%> on him, and passed by on the other side. <S%G492><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4541>Samaritan,<s%> as he <S%G3593>journeyed,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> where he was: <S%G2596><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he had <S%G4697>compassion<s%> on him,

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4334>went<s%> to him, and bound <S%G2611>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5134>wounds,<s%> pouring <S%G2022>in<s%> <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1913>set<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2934>beast,<s%> and <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> an <S%G3829>inn,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> took <S%G1959>care<s%> of him. <S%G846><s%>
